componentContainer.title: HTMLParameterPanel Help
componentContainer.p: This plugin allows you to use HTML in your parameter panels to input data to your procedures or states.
To call this plugin in your procedure create the custom property customType with the value @PLUGIN_NAME@/HTML

Define your page in the property ec_parameterHTML. To incorporate your parameters in the HTML, simply use a id matching your parameter name.
The tooltip, displayed if you over for a few seconds over the parameter widget, is your parameter description.
The default value displayed is the parameter default value.
